metadata.title: CVE-2022-3331 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions startingfrom 14.5 before 15.1.6, all versions starting from 15.2 before 15.2.4, allversions starting from 15.3 before 15.3.2. GitLab's Zentao integration hasan insecure direct object reference vulnerability that may be exploited byan attacker to leak Zentao project issues.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
